revision.text: The '''Pokémon Day Care''' is a location in [[Kanto]] where [[Eggs]] and [[Fossils]] can be bred. Additionally, obtained [[List of Pokémon with attack|Pokémon]] that have reached level 100 can be bred to receive an Attack bonus equal to 25% of its Base Attack. The Pokémon Day Care is unlocked upon clearing '''Route 5''' of [[Kanto]].
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
